name: Sweet Potato Soufflé
ingredients: 3 cups sweet potatoes, cooked and mashed
instructions: Mix together well, sweet potatoes, sugar, salt, eggs, butter, milk, and vanilla.
Pour into greased baking dish and bake at 350 for 35 minutes.
Remove from oven and top with the topping that has been mixed together.
Return to oven and continue baking for 20 additional minutes.
